content: materials our super easy baby blanket in morning bundle 1 includes… - 7 skeins of purl soho s morning 2 75% organically grown cotton and 25% yak each skein is 191 yards approximately 1 337 total yards required - a purl soho tote bag with the pattern printed on the back - a postcard of the finished blanket you ll also need… - us 5 3 75 mm 24- or 32-inch circular needles 3 choose from three pretty color palettes… beach plum - color a heirloom white - color b sweet apricot - color c pink lemonade - color d pink radish - color e purple allium - color f mountain purple - color g dungarees blue peninsula - color a araucana blue - color b fresh sky - color c tender green - color d cucumber ice - color e heirloom white - color f grassland gray - color g stone cottage piazza - color a tender green - color b cucumber ice - color c sweet apricot - color d yellow apple - color e heirloom white - color f grassland gray - color g stone cottage gauge 20 stitches and 48 row = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions approximately 30 inches wide x 37 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/super-easy-baby-blanket-in-morning html 2 https //www purlsoho com/morning html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
